subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The info command provides support for listing information from the station configuration.

tr.td: Override the RMI registry port to use when selecting the station server.

subsection.name: Example - General Listing
subsection.pre:
$ station info
Server is operational. Port: 1099 Store: local:xml:dpml/station/registry Basedir: c:\dev\dpml\main Codebase: artifact:jar:dpml/metro/dpml-station-server#SNAPSHOT
Profile count: 1
(1) demo STARTED link:part:dpml/planet/http/dpml-http-demo
